title: "showstats: quick and compact summary statistics"
format: gfm
jupyter: python3
---

**showstats** produces summary statistic tables with vertical orientation.

```{python}
# | output: false
# | echo: false
import polars as pl
import sys

sys.path.append("src/")
sys.path.append("tests/")
from pathlib import Path
from conftest import sample_df_

df_all = sample_df_()

df = df_all.select(
    pl.col("float_col").alias("float_col"),
    pl.col("str_col").alias("string"),
    pl.col("date_col").alias("date"),
    pl.col("datetime_col").alias("datetime"),
    pl.col("null_col"),
    pl.col("int_col").alias("X"),
    pl.col("int_with_missing").alias("Y"),
)
import showstats
```

```{python}

from showstats import show_stats

show_stats(df)
```

Primarily built for polars data frames, **showstats** converts other inputs. 

For compatibility with pandas.DataFrames install as ``pip install showstats[pandas]``.
